name: 3 2 1 RUN!!!
description:
Escape the darkness that is chasing you. 

Shards will slow the darkness down, if you collect them. But if it collects them well...

How far can you get?

Instructions:
Movement - Arrow keys , 
Jump - Spacebar

Credits:
Music & SFX
Mystical Theme, Alexandr Zhelanov
Something Behind Me, Kim Lightyear
Art
Pixel Platformer Player
1-bit Pixel Forest
